input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: This product, the Garden Mount Weathervane, is a high-quality weathervane that can be used to add a touch of elegance and charm to any outdoor space. Made of durable 14 gauge steel, this weathervane features a flag design that will look great in any yard. The antique copper finish gives it a rustic and timeless look, and sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement. It comes with a 60-inch mounting rod, making it easy to install and adjust as needed. This weathervane is perfect for any outdoor space, from gardens to patios to lawns.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
